content.body:
### Shop 295/80R22.5 Tire Size
295/80R22.5 tires are typically found on commercial trucks, and their large size shows that they are able to carry heavy loads and perform in grueling conditions. A popular size in the commercial segment, 295/80R22.5 tires are available in drive, all-position, steer, and trailer axle fitments for use in regional, urban, long haul, and coach/bus applications.

All-position tires can be used on the drive, steer, and trailer axle, making them a great choice for drivers who like versatility. Check out the Continental HSR2 SA, [Falken RI151](https://simpletire.com/brands/falken-tires/ri151), and Atlas AP100 II if you want a 295/80R22.5 tire that offers great performance on any axle.

The steer axle is vital to steering, handling, and ride comfort and is found on the front of a truck. Take a look at the [Toyo M144](https://simpletire.com/brands/toyo-tires/m144), Crosswind CWA207, and Cosmo CT588 Plus if you’re looking for a 295/80R22.5 tire that offers great steering and handling performance.

Drive axle tires are designed to provide strong traction regardless of the terrain that they’re on, so finding a good one becomes a must. Consider the Armstrong ADR1 and [Cosmo CT701 Plus](https://simpletire.com/brands/cosmo-tires/ct701-plus) if you need a 295/80R22.5 tire for the drive axle of your truck.

Whether you need an all-position, steer, drive, or another tire for your commercial truck, SimpleTire has a set of 295/80R22.5 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
